original_text: Then the Jewish leaders told Peter and John to come back into the room. They said to them, ‘You must not use the authority of Jesus to teach people any more. You must not speak about him.’
korean_text: 그들을 불러 경고하여 도무지 예수의 이름으로 말하지도 말고 가르치지도 말라 하니

sentences.original_text: Then the Jewish leaders told Peter and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 유대 지도자들이 베드로와 요한에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: to come back into the room
'You must not use the authority of Jesus
You must not speak about him.'
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그에 대해 말해서는 안 된다.'
